theorem irreducible\<^sub>d_factorization_exists: assumes "degree p > 0" shows "\<exists>fs. fs \<noteq> [] \<and> (\<forall>f \<in> set fs. irreducible\<^sub>d f \<and> degree f \<le> degree p) \<and> p = prod_list fs" and "\<not>irreducible\<^sub>d p \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>fs. length fs > 1 \<and> (\<forall>f \<in> set fs. irreducible\<^sub>d f \<and> degree f < degree p) \<and> p = prod_list fs"
